description:
Stingy Annette finds herself suddenly unable to save money. Is it truly a snake spirit`s curse? Later, Masato attempts to sabotage Rinne`s happiness... again.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Curse of Splurge / The Cursed Peep Ball
L`envoûtement panier percé – La boule de vision maudite
Sanzai no Noroi / Norowareta Nozoki Tama
散財の呪い / 呪われたのぞき玉
